net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.label: o5e_ExtDB_stripUnspecified
net.rptools.maptool.model.MacroButtonPro.toolTip:
Given a JSON object, strip keys that are unspecified. By default, unspecified keys are those with: - a value of "" - or a value of "-1"
An optional parameter may be passed to indicate an alternative value to identify unspecified keys which will only replace the key value "-1"; A blank string will always be considered to be an unspecified value.
arg (0) = JSON object arg (1) = (Optional) Key-value to indicate "unspecified" arg (2) = (Optional) Array of protected keys - These will be ignored
